dcan.c File Reference

This file contains the device abstraction layer APIs for DCAN peripheral. More...

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdint.h>
#include <ti/csl/csl_types.h>
#include <ti/csl/hw_types.h>
#include <ti/csl/csl_dcan.h>

Macros

#define DCAN_PARITY_DISABLED   (5U)
 Parity function is disabled.
 
#define DCAN_PARITY_ENABLED   (0U)
 Parity function is enabled.
 
#define DCAN_ECC_DIAG_DISABLED   (0xAU)
 ECC Diagnostic mode is disabled.
 
#define DCAN_ECC_DIAG_ENABLED   (0x5U)
 ECC Diagnostic mode is enabled.
 
#define DCAN_ECC_MODE_ENABLED   (0x0U)
 SECDED Single bit Error correction is enabled.
 
#define DCAN_ECC_MODE_DISABLED   (0x5U)
 SECDED Single bit Error correction is disabled.
 
#define DCAN_ECC_SBE_EVT_ENABLED   (0x0U)
 SECDED Single bit Error Event is enabled.
 
#define DCAN_ECC_SBE_EVT_DISABLED   (0x5U)
 SECDED Single bit Error Event is disabled.

 This API will reset the DCAN module and configure the DCAN TX/RX IO Control register. More...
 
void DCANSetMode (uint32_t baseAddr, uint32_t mode)
 This API will configure the operating mode of DCAN In Init mode the communication on CAN bus is stopped and the controller needs to be placed in Init mode for initialization To start communication on CAN bus please keep the DCAN controller in Normal mode of operation. More...

Detailed Description

This file contains the device abstraction layer APIs for DCAN peripheral.

Function Documentation

int32_t DCANClrEccDiagErrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const dcanEccErrStatus_t *  errClr 
)

This function clears the error status of DCAN ECC Diagnostic.

Parameters
errClrHolds the values of which error need to be cleared. Refer dcanEccErrStatus_t for more details. A value of 1 is written to these fields that need to be cleared and 0 for those that need not be cleared.
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
Note
This API is valid only for Tda3xx
int32_t DCANClrEccErrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const dcanEccErrStatus_t *  errClr 
)

This function clears the error status of DCAN ECC.

Parameters
errClrHolds the values of which error need to be cleared. Refer dcanEccErrStatus_t for more details. A value of 1 is written to these fields that need to be cleared and 0 for those that need not be cleared.
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
Note
This API is valid only for Tda3xx
void DCANClrParityIntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This function clears the status of parity error on DCAN_PARITY interrupt line.

Returns
None
void DCANConfig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const dcanCfgParams_t *  pDcanCfgPrms 
)

This API configures DCAN controller.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module Register
pDcanCfgPrmsPointer which holds DCAN controller config parameters
Returns
None
Note
The API DCANReset has to be called before this API can be used
void DCANConfigIntrMux ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrLineNum,
uint32_t  msgObj 
)

This API will configure which interrupt line is used to service interrupts for message objects.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
msgObjMessage object number
intrLineNumInterrupt line number to be configured For valid values refer enum dcanIntrLineNum_t
Returns
None
int32_t DCANConfigMsgObj ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  msgObj,
uint32_t  ifRegNum,
const dcanMsgObjCfgParams_t *  pMsgObjCfgPrms 
)

This API configures DCAN TX/RX message object.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
msgObjMessage object number of CAN node Valid values: 1 to 64
ifRegNumDCAN interface register number For valid value refer enum dcanIfRegNum_t
pMsgObjCfgPrmsPointer which holds DCAN message object Config parameters of TX/RX
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL when IF register busy flag is set
void DCANEccDiagModeEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  enableEccDiagMode 
)

Enable/disable the DCAN ECC Diagnostic Mode.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
enableEccDiagModeEnable/Disable DCAN ECC Diagnostic Mode Valid values: TRUE or FALSE
Returns
None
Note
This API is valid only for Tda3xx
void DCANEccModeEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  enableEccMode,
uint32_t  enableSbeEvent 
)

This API is used to Enable/disable SECDED Single bit Error correction and SECDED Single bit Error Event.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
enableEccModeEnable/Disable SECDED Single bit Error correction. Valid values: TRUE or FALSE
enableSbeEventEnable/Disable SECDED Single bit Error Event. Valid values: TRUE or FALSE
Returns
None
Note
This API is valid only for Tda3xx
int32_t DCANGetData ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  msgObj,
uint32_t  ifRegNum,
dcanRxParams_t *  pDcanRxPrms,
uint32_t  timeOut 
)

This API gets received CAN message from message RAM.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
msgObjMessage object number of CAN node Valid values : 1 to 64
ifRegNumDCAN interface register number For valid values refer enum dcanIfRegNum_t
pDcanRxPrmsPointer which holds DCAN receive parameters
timeOutTimeout value
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL when IF register busy flag is set
Note
The API will receive valid data of size dataLength
uint32_t DCANGetEccDiagErrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will read the ECC diagnostic status information of DCAN controller.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
Returns
Returns the ECC disagnostic error status information. For valid values refer enum #dcanEccDiagErrStsMask_t
Note
This API is valid only for Tda3xx
uint32_t DCANGetEccErrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will read the ECC error status information of DCAN controller.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
Returns
Returns the ECC error status information.
Note
This API is valid only for Tda3xx
uint32_t DCANGetErrCntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will read the error counter status of DCAN.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
Returns
Returns the error counter status values. For valid values refer enum dcanErrCntrMask_t
uint32_t DCANGetErrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will read the error and status information of DCAN controller.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
Returns
Returns the error and status values.For valid values refer enum dcanErrStsMask_t
Note
Reading the error and status register will clear/set certain bits in the error and status register. For more information please refer the DCAN Technical Reference Manual(TRM). For debug support, the auto clear functionality of error and status register is disabled when in debug/suspend mode
uint32_t DCANGetIntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrLineNum 
)

This API returns interrupt line status of DCAN.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
intrLineNumDCAN interrupt line number For valid values refer enum dcanIntrLineNum_t
Returns
message object number with highest pending interrupt or number which indicates Source of the interrupt 0x0000 : No interrupt is pending 0x0001-0x0040 : Message object Number which caused the interrupt 0x0041-0x7FFF : Unused 0x8000 : DCAN_ES value is not 0x07. 0x8001-0xFFFF : Unused
uint32_t DCANGetMsgObjBitErrDetected ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API returns message object number where DCAN ECC Single Bit Error is detected.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
Returns
retVal Returns the message object number where DCAN ECC Single Bit Error is detected For Tda2xx it returns DCAN_INVALID_MSG_OBJECT
Note
This API is valid only for Tda3xx
uint32_t DCANGetParityErrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will read the DCAN parity error status.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
Returns
Returns the DCAN parity error status. For valid values refer enum dcanParityErrSts_t
uint32_t DCANHasRxMsgArrived ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  msgObj 
)

This API returns Rx message object reception status whether Rx message object has a pending Rx data or not.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
msgObjMessage object number of CAN node Valid values: 1 to 64
Returns
TRUE when new data has arrived else FALSE when new data has not arrived
void DCANIntrClearStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  msgObj,
uint32_t  ifRegNum 
)

This API will clear the interrupt pending status of received message objects after a new message is received.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
msgObjMessage object number of CAN node Valid values : 1 to 64
ifRegNumDCAN interface register number For valid values refer enum dcanIfRegNum_t
Returns
None
uint32_t DCANIsIfRegBusy ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  ifRegNum 
)

This API checks for whether DCAN IF Register is busy or not.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
ifRegNumDCAN interface register number For valid values refer enum dcanIfRegNum_t
Returns
TRUE when DCAN IF Register is busy else FALSE when DCAN IF Register is not busy
uint32_t DCANIsMsgObjIntrPending ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  msgObj 
)

This API returns message object interrupt pending status.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
msgObjMessage object number of CAN node Valid values: 1 to 64
Returns
TRUE when message object has pending interrupt else FALSE when message object has no pending interrupt
uint32_t DCANIsMsgValid ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  msgObj 
)

This API checks for whether msgObj is valid or not.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN Module Registers.
msgObjMessage object number whose message valid status is to be returned.
Returns
TRUE when message object is valid else FALSE when message object is invalid
uint32_t DCANIsTxMsgPending ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  msgObj 
)

This API returns Tx message object transmission status whether Tx message object has a pending Tx request or not.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
msgObjMessage object number of CAN node Valid values: 1 to 64
Returns
FALSE when data transmission is successful else TRUE when data transmission is not successful
void DCANParityEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  enablePMD 
)

Enable/disable the DCAN parity/ECC.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
enablePMDEnable/Disable DCAN parity(for Tda2xx)/ECC(for Tda3xx) Valid values: TRUE or FALSE
Returns
None
int32_t DCANReset ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  timeOut 
)

This API will reset the DCAN module and configure the DCAN TX/RX IO Control register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module Register
timeOutTimeout value
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL when DCAN reset fails
Note
This API has to be called before the driver can be used
void DCANSetBitTime ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const dcanBitTimeParams_t *  pBitTimePrms 
)

This API configures bit time parameters for DCAN module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module Register
pBitTimePrmsPointer which holds DCAN bit time parameters
Returns
None
void DCANSetMode ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  mode 
)

This API will configure the operating mode of DCAN In Init mode the communication on CAN bus is stopped and the controller needs to be placed in Init mode for initialization To start communication on CAN bus please keep the DCAN controller in Normal mode of operation.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module Register
modeDCAN mode to be configured For valid values refer enum dcanMode_t
Returns
None
void DCANTestModeEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  enableTestMode,
uint32_t  testMode 
)

Enable/ Disable the test mode of DCAN.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
enableTestModeEnable/Disable test mode of DCAN. Valid values: TRUE or FALSE
testModeSelect the DCAN test mode For valid values refer enum # dcanTestMode_t
Returns
None
int32_t DCANTransmitData ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  msgObj,
uint32_t  ifRegNum,
const dcanTxParams_t *  pDcanTxPrms,
uint32_t  timeOut 
)

This API transmits a CAN message and writes a CAN message into a CAN message object.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCAN module register
msgObjMessage object number of CAN node Valid values: 1 to 64
ifRegNumDCAN interface register number For valid values refer enum dcanIfRegNum_t
pDcanTxPrmsPointer which holds DCAN transmit parameters
timeOutTimeout value
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL when IF register busy flag is set
